title: TAB列表乱码
author: woshinidemama6
txt_content: 悬赏！！扩服以后就成这样了TAB列表请问怎么设置

replies.author: 桃渊林
replies.txt_content: bc端吗？请使用utf-8(好像记错了还乱码就转成gb2312)

replies.author: md_5
replies.txt_content:
如果你的服务器是Windows系统转码gb2312
如果是Linux转码utf-8

replies.author: woshinidemama6
replies.txt_content: 就是这个情况 突破发给你了
